qas.question: Who was the only host of American Idol after season one?
Which host quit after the first season?

context: The first season was co-hosted by <a0_0>Ryan Seacrest<a0_0/> and <a1_0>Brian Dunkleman<a1_0/>. Dunkleman quit thereafter, making Seacrest the sole emcee of the show starting with season two.
